flashcards.back: It is a type of motor that is responsible for moving or controlling a mechanism or system. Yep

Measure value internally to system(robot)
Examples: motor speed, wheel load, battery status and stall

Information from the robot"s environment.
Example: distances to objects and intensity of ambient light

Scribbler has two IR Obstacle sensors under the light sensors that return a binary value 0 or 1. Scribbler has 1 IR receiver located in the center, and two emitters located on left and right side of the emitter.
